name: Made in Katana
description:
Made In Katana is a creative digital agency working with local and international clients across graphic design, motion and content creation, technology, brand development and influences marketing. We deliver digital solutions that always surprise and excite an audience. Through a close partnership with our clients, we provide a fresh view and expertise in strategy and technology.
Our process involves extensive research which puts us a step ahead of the crowd and provides rich experiences that resonate with your global audience.
